name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella cheese, tangy tomato sauce, and aromatic basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A mouthwatering pizza topped with mozzarella cheese and plenty of spicy pepperoni slices.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A tangy and smoky pizza topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, and red onions, finished with a sprinkle of fresh cilantro.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A healthy vegetarian pizza loaded with bell peppers, olives, onions, and mushrooms on a delicious tomato sauce base.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A sweet and savory pizza topped with juicy pineapple and savory ham.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: A rich and creamy pizza with a blend of four cheeses: mozzarella, parmesan, gorgonzola, and ricotta.
